title: 8 min + Queues for new game mode?
body: Is anyone else having long queues to get into this? I feel like I can't escape dynamic queue times.

replies.body: Probably because a lot of players don't like it.... it's ARAM where you can pick which champion you want, with the inclusion of the occasional king poro that does almost nothing to help.
No.... I had 1-2 minute ques for leg of the poro.
